      • create

        public static SignedContainer create(File file,
                                     com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<File> dataFiles)
                              throws IOException,
                                     ContainerDataFilesEmptyException
        Create a new signed container with given data files.
        Parameters:
        file - Path to the created container.
        dataFiles - List of paths to data files.
        Returns:
        New signed container with given data files and no signatures.
        Throws:
        IOException - When given paths are inaccessible.
        ContainerDataFilesEmptyException - When no data files are given.

      • open

        public static SignedContainer open(File file)
                            throws IOException
        Open a signed container from File.
        Parameters:
        file - Path to existing container.
        Returns:
        Signed container with data files and signatures.
        Throws:
        IOException - When file could not be found/opened.

      • isContainer

        public static boolean isContainer(File file)
        Check whether this is a signature container file which should be opened as such or a regular file which should be added to the container.
        Parameters:
        file - File to check.
        Returns:
        True if it is a container, false otherwise.

      • isLegacyContainer

        public static boolean isLegacyContainer(File file)
        Check whether this is a legacy container which needs to be wrapped in a valid container type before adding signature.
        Parameters:
        file - File to check.
        Returns:
        True if it is a legacy container, false otherwise.

        public static String mimeType(File file)
        Get MIME type from file extension.
        Parameters:
        file - File to get the extension from.
        Returns:
        MIME type of the file.
